name: Emerald Crypto
description: Emerald Crypto is an open source project of a PoW Scrypt Litecoin clone with an amazing 20sec blocktime and a DGW3 retargeting difficulty after each block you can get more details about Emerald Crypto on https://coinwik.org/Emerald_Crypto we decribe our project as "the green pennystock of the cryptocurrencies"
